DEPARTMENT OK BANKING V DEPARTMENT OF BANKING State of Nebraska SUPERINTENDENT B. N. Saunders DEPUTY SUPERINTENDENTS J. F. McLain Geo. B. Wilson EXAMINERS John J. Aron C. R. Halnes J - F - Uates L. L. Hallstead C. A. Campbell Karle j Homer Fred W. Carter B . w HoUBton I. P.Gaebier a. k. Jorgenaen Merl H. Garrison X w Kobb

DEPARTMENT OF BANKING VI Lincoln. Nebraska October 15, 193 7 R. 1.. Cophrau. Governor. Executive Off lets, Lincoln, Nebraska. Dear Sir: We submit for your consideration the Biennial Report of the De - partment of Banking covering the period from July 1, 1935 to lum- SO. 1937 inclusive. Comprised m this report are statements and other statistical in - formation pertaininc to the , various institutions under the supi-r - -\iBlon or this Department. Statements are shown as or call June :*'> 1937. Respectfully, DEIWRTMENT OK BANKING n. N. Saunders, Superintendent.

STATEMENTS Showing the Condition of the 296 Commercial and Savings Banks m the State of Nebraska, at the close of business June 30, 1937.
